name: SiliconHillsWealthManagement
0:
”Alexa, ask Silicon Hills Wealth to tell me about James Werner”
”Alexa, ask Silicon Hills Wealth to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask Silicon Hills Wealth to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silicon hills wealth
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear the latest viewpoint on investing, retirement, and market events from your financial advisors at Silicon Hills Wealth based in Austin, TX. 

Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, open Silicon Hills Wealth."

Other things you can ask:

First say, "Alexa, open Silicon Hills Wealth."
"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about James Werner."
"Tell me about Tom Brown."
"Play the latest update."

"When people first approach our firm, they are often very focused on traditional investment advice.

Clients quickly come to understand the true value of our partnership lies in the personalized guidance, spirited collaboration, and unparalleled responsiveness to every aspect of their financial well-being. Our clients actively participate in the decision-making, and their unique aspirations are an integral part of our customized solutions."

Learn more: www.siliconhillswealth.com

James Werner is a Certified Financial Planner™ professional with over 25 years’ experience in wealth management and personal financial planning. James takes a special interest in areas where finance intersects with daily life.

Tom Brown:
One whiteboard session. That’s all it takes for Tom to inspire you to think differently.

With over 30 years as both an innovator and entrepreneur, Tom has always been a visionary with an unrelenting drive for growth. He built a large tech consulting firm from the ground up and successfully exited through an acquisition by a publicly-traded company in the early 2000s.

Follow SHWM: 
Twitter: @JAllenWerner
Instagram: @avoicefromthehills

Silicon Hills Wealth Management is a registered investment advisor based in Austin, Texas led by James Werner and Tom Brown.

Request an invite to launch your own custom Alexa skill like this at WealthVoice.ai
